cases.title: Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness Excluded in Products Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness was not allowed to testify in a products liability case as he does not have knowledge regarding storage units.

cases.title: Statistics Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Part
cases.description: The court ruled a Statistics Expert Witness's could testify concerning a survey, but not on evidence regarding the sample class.

cases.title: Forensic Engineering Expert Allowed to Testify Regarding Water Heater Leak
cases.description: Despite no knowledge of the design and manufacturing of water heaters, plaintiff's Forensic Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify on an alleged defect.
